section.title: Textbook
section.p: We are trying out a new free textbook written by PCC faculty. The book is called ORCCA (Open Resources for Community College Algebra). We're excited to replace a roughly \$100 book with this free book and save you a significant amount of money. This is the first time any class anywhere is using this book (along with ten other sections at PCC), and we will be asking you for your thoughts and feedback about it. We will work to make it better every term from here on out, so that future students have a free, excellent basic algebra textbook.
If you find any issues with this book where you think we could make it better, please let me know about each one.

You can access this book as a web page at spot.pcc.edu/math/orcca/orcca.html. You can download a printable version of it at spot.pcc.edu/~ajordan/orcca.pdf. You can purchase a printed copy at the Sylvania book store for \$37.50. You could also print the PDF above yourself and probably save a little money.
